Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Test Result/Laboratory Finding/Abnormal Laboratory Test Result/Abnormal Blood Chemistry and Hematology Test Result/Hypercholesterolemia
Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Lipid Metabolism Disorders/Dyslipidemias/Hyperlipidemias/Hypercholesterolemia
Record.BroaderTerm: Abnormal Blood Chemistry and Hematology Test Result
Record.Description: Hypercholesterolemia; the presence of an abnormal amount of cholesterol in the cells and plasma of the blood.
A condition with abnormally high levels of CHOLESTEROL in the blood. It is defined as a cholesterol value exceeding the 95th percentile for the population.
